Throughout the Asia Pacific region, most businesses are quite optimistic, going forward.
When you break down this survey, it gets quite interesting...
...the Philippines was the most positive country with an index reading of 100.
Absolutely, I think that there is something happening in the Philippines,...
...it has been quite positive for the past few observations.
And I think that if you look at the data there is a good reason to think that...
...this is not just some crazy optimism,...
...indeed the Philippines has been growing at about five percent.
